item.title: Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut - Desiderio N°1
item.description: With the Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut, a first-class spumante comes into the glass. It reveals a wonderfully brilliant, golden yellow colour. The perlage of this spumante is vital and long-lasting in the glass. Rosé Spumante Brut by Desiderio N°1 is just the right thing for all wine connoisseurs who like as little sweetness as possible in their wine. At the same time, however, it never appears meager or brittle, as one can naturally expect from a wine. On the palate, the texture of this light-footed Spumante is wonderfully light. Due to its lively fruit acidity, the Desiderio N°1 Rosé Spumante Brut reveals itself to be fantastically fresh and lively on the palate. The final of this Spumante from the wine-growing region Veneto captivates finally with good reverberation.
